description: A 95-yard kick-off return, acrobatic efforts and incredible interceptions all feature in week 17 of the best plays across the NFL.

title: Leeds 'brimming with confidence' in full-team goal - Hart
description: Match of the Day pundits  Joe Hart and Danny Murphy praise Leeds United's build-up play, which resulted in Dominic Calvert-Lewin's equaliser against Sunderland.

title: Richarlison excels in otherwise 'not great' game for Spurs - Hart
description: Match of the Day pundit Joe Hart says Richarlison stood out for Tottenham Hotspur in a match where they were 'absolutely battered' by Crystal Palace despite winning 1-0.

title: A classic, nostalgic time-travel adventure
description: Marty McFly is always late - until the day he finds himself 30 years early!

title: 'I cannot forget this until I die' - Sudan's players on horrors of civil war
description: Forward John Mano, who lost his best friend to the civil war in Sudan, says the squad will "fight" for their country on the pitch at the 2025 Africa Cup of Nations.

title: Ronaldo will not retire until he scores 1,000 goals
description: Portugal captain Cristiano Ronaldo says he will not end his playing career until he scores his 1,000th career goal.

title: 'Point of the match!' - Sabalenka hits 'amazing' winner against Kyrgios
description: Aryna Sabalenka hits an 'amazing' return against Nick Kyrgios at the Battle of the Sexes in Dubai.

title: Kyrgios defeats Sabalenka in 'Battle of the Sexes'
description: Watch the best moments between Aryna Sabalenka and Nick Kyrgios at the Battle of the Sexes in Dubai.

title: Kyrgios defeats Sabalenka - but what did 'Battle of the Sexes' achieve?
description: Aryna Sabalenka loses to Nick Kyrgios in a Battle of the Sexes-style match that lacked the intensity and entertainment promised in the build-up.

title: Who has made Troy's Premier League team of the week?
description: After every round of Premier League matches this season, Troy Deeney gives us his team of the week. Do you agree with his choices?

title: 'A stellar legacy on and off the field' - Hugh Morris obituary
description: Hugh Morris, who has died at the age of 62, enjoyed a distinguished career in which he led from the front both on and off the cricket field.

title: Welsh rugby 'on a precipice' after shocking year
description: BBC Sport looks at another tumultuous 12 months for the men's game in Wales with Welsh rugby close to rock bottom.

title: Take on our BBC Gameshows ultimate football quiz
description: We've built five quizzes to celebrate five BBC shows - but only those with the biggest football trivia brains can beat them all.

title: Booze, beach, beaten - how England lost the Ashes
description: BBC Sport chief cricket reporter Stephan Shemilt reveals the inside story of England's Ashes defeat in Australia on and off the pitch.

title: I've realised I can make a difference - Hoy
description: In a new BBC documentary, Sir Chris Hoy shows how he is using his Olympic mindset to reframe his purpose following a terminal cancer diagnosis.

title: The man behind the headlines - Salah, by Klopp, Diaz and more
description: BBC Sport explores Mohamed Salah's personality with help from the people who know him best.

title: Inside McLaren's season - the rules, values, incidents & relationships
description: Intra-team title battles turn toxic far more often than not. Andrew Benson analyses how McLaren have maintained relative harmony between Lando Norris and Oscar Piastri.

title: England's AI World Cup masterplan - from perfecting penalties to powering players
description: BBC Sport hears from inside the England setup about how artificial intelligence is powering plans for next summer's World Cup.

title: 'Raise hell' - the fastest bowler you might not have heard of
description: The story of Duncan Spencer, the "frighteningly fast" bowler who could have played for England or Australia.

description: Jannik Sinner and Carlos Alcaraz have dominated men‚Äôs tennis in 2025. BBC Sport looks at the evolution of their growing rivalry ‚Äì and where it could go next.
